Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1973...
Injured on 6/3/1977 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/16/1977 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1979, off Al Holland (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1979, off Vince Colbert (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1979, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1982, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/7/1983 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
